Articles.Content:
\*BANG!\*

The big bang happens and after billions of years, there forms a planet with a hill on it.

My hill.
/danny2462 nobodies' emptiness.

/reset

\*clearing all cookies

\*clearing all history

\*resetting world

\*rebuilding hill

\*giving hill to mikeman7918

My hill.

i swipe the hill when you aren't looking.

My hill

I make a new hill.

My new hill.

i swipe all your hills that you have and will have built.

my infinite hills

I sneak away with one of your hills.

My hill.

You bought too many of my baked goods and ran out of money. As a last resort, you paid your large debts with your hill.

My hill.
\*danny2462\* my hill.

I use the bakery goods as projectiles in an invasion of the hill.

My hill covered in bakery goods.

i recruit an army of hobbits.

my hobbit infested hill

Sharkey (saruman) leads them off.

My hill.

DERP CANNON

my hill

The baked goods are still here. I build a large suction vent, collect them, clean them off and sell them. With the money I got I reload the ammo on my Flying Fortress / Rapid delivery machine and rampage on your hill.

My hill. Baked goods FTW.
planetary annihilation releases the unit cannon. my hill.

i blow up all power plants. thereby shutting down planetary annihilation.

my hill

I take the hill while you are busy with the power planet.

My hill.

You step into a C4-Nitroglycerin mine that I planted earlier.

My hill.

The mine was a dud.

Still my hill.

You got sniped and your brain explodes.

Then I planted a hill full of TNT-Nitroglycerin-C4 mines, and walked away without triggering a mine. Oh and FYI it is *so* sensitive that even an extremely high-pitched voice and trigger the mine, and once a mine exploded there will be chain reactions.

No one's mined hill.

I use [shears](http://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Shears) to remove all the mines.

My hill, covered in hole traps.

I cover the hill in a tarp and then I cover the tarp with dirt.

My slightly bigger hill.
I delete tarp. your falling apart hill

i delete your face.

my hill with stumbling headless megatigher78

I ban both of you from the forums and repair the hill.

My steel-reinforced hill.
